subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Rosen was a slugging third baseman for the Indians best remembered for his 1953 season, when his .336 batting average left him just shy of the batting triple crown.
snippet: Rosen was a slugging third baseman for the Indians best remembered for his 1953 season, when his .336 batting average left him just shy of the batting triple crown.
